data.message: It would be nice if facebook allowed us to tag people on our buisness page we aren't friends with. That way we can have a personal facebook page separate from our business life.  It forces us to not share and not post things we may not want clients to read...  Like personal stuff etc...Sometimes clients will tag themselves but often not... I Know I'm not alone in this complaint.

replies.message: Thanks for the feedback, Laura. We're listening to all of the suggestions we get from the Facebook community. If you have anymore, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Rose
Ummm...wouldn't it b easier to keep 2 separate FB pages to avoid crossover? JMO...
Maybe create a category of business clients, and when you post something you don't want clients to see make it visible to "friends not clients", or something like that?

Clients don't always want to be friends with us either... It would be nice to be able to tag them but not to have our lives intermingle. It use to be against facebooks terms of service to have more than one facebook account.
